name: nexd
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wn(wex(s0, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))
-| wi(w0, wn(w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wn(wex(s0, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))
-| wi(w0, wn(w1))

|- wi(w0, wn(wex(s0, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wn(w1))
-| wnf(s0, w0)

comment: Deduction for generalization rule for negated wff. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Sep-2016.)
